member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpRouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpRouteCollection)
member.summary: Scans the calling assembly for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, using the default conventions.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebConfiguration.AddDefaultRouteConstraint(System.String,System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint)
member.summary: Automatically applies the specified constaint against url parameters with names that match the given regular expression.
member.param: The regex used to match url parameter names
The constraint to apply to matched parameters

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebConfiguration.UseRouteHandler(System.Func{System.Web.Routing.IRouteHandler})
member.summary: Specifies a function that returns an alternate route handler. By default, the route handler is the default HttpControllerRouteHandler.
